Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at The Royal National Hotel places you in the heart of London, walking distance from University of London and Russell Square. This hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Eye.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 1271 guestrooms. Bathrooms have bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones and coffee/tea makers.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include a hair salon and shopping on site.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Royal National Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Check-in time starts at 3:00 PM Check-out time is 12:00 PM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of The Royal National Hotel. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same property / stay dates).
Make use of convenient amenities, which include a hair salon and shopping on site.

A stay at The Royal National Hotel places you in the heart of London, walking distance from University of London and Russell Square. This hotel is close to St. Paul's Cathedral and London Eye.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Russell Square - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
The British Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
British Library - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi

London Palladium Theatre - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Leicester Square - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
KoKo London - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi

London Coliseum - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Piccadilly Circus - 1.6 km / 1 mi
St. Martin-in-the-Fields - 1.6 km / 1 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 12.5 km / 7.8 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 23 km / 14.3 mi
London (LGW-Gatwick) - 40.9 km / 25.4 mi
London (LTN-Luton) - 43.1 km / 26.8 mi
London (STN-Stansted) - 48.8 km / 30.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Royal National Hotel is London (LHR-Heathrow).

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
Special cancellation policies or charges may apply for group reservations (more than 8 rooms for the same property / stay dates).

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Trouser press, iron, hairdryer, fridge & computer point are available in rooms on request. The hotel does not accept any group (10 person or more arriving together). If there is a booking with 10 or more persons ,the booking will be cancelled. For the rates shown the maximum permitted consecutive stay is 29 nights. Any reservation or multiple reservations under the same lead name over 29 consecutive nights will be cancelled by the property. At least one name per room should be provided. Name changes are not allowed and no multiple bookings for identical dates under the same name can be accepted. Applicable from 04/Feb/2015 to 30/Jun/2019
Deposit on arrival. Applicable from 03/Jun/2019 to 10/Jun/2019
Car park YES (without additional debit notes). Applicable from 03/Jun/2019 to 10/Jun/2019

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

"one 24hr City Cruise ticket per person (adult, child or infant) per stay included. Clients will be able to exchange their voucher with the actual ticket from the City Cruises ticket office located by Westminster/Tower/ Greenwich Pier.
